Theme example

This is a template showcasing the optional theme stylesheet included in Bootstrap. Use it as a starting point to create something more unique by building on or modifying it.

Colors

Color are normalized in sass with functions : ultraligh($color)

.bg-prim-ultralight
.bg-seca-ultralight
.bg-secb-ultralight
.bg-secc-ultralight
.bg-secd-ultralight
.bg-comp-ultralight

.bg-secb-light
.bg-secc-light

.bg-comp-light

.bg-secb-standard
.bg-secc-standard

Cartouche

Core

EMF

  <span class="cartouche">
    John Doe
  </span>

Result

John Doe

Color

Color sample, just add colorName to CSS attribute like this class="cartouche prim"

.cartouche.prim
.cartouche.seca
.cartouche.secb
.cartouche.secc
.cartouche.secd
.cartouche.comp

bordered CSS class display a border :

.cartouche.prim
.cartouche.seca
.cartouche.secb
.cartouche.secc
.cartouche.secd
.cartouche.comp

Addon

Visual addon on right.

EMF

<span class="cartouche">
  John Doe
  <span class="addon">addon</span>
</span>

Result

John Doe addon

Color

Color are enabled :

.prim addon
.seca addon
.secb addon
.secc addon
.secd addon
.comp addon

And borders :

.prim addon
.seca addon
.secb addon
.secc addon
.secd addon
.comp addon

Size

sizing class

.xs
cartouche cartouche .addon
.normal
cartouche cartouche .addon
.big
cartouche cartouche .addon
.hudge
cartouche cartouche .addon

Icons

Based on fontello

Usage

Code sample

<div class="icon-link-outline">
  Some content here
</div>

<!-- or -->

<p>
  Use icon
  <i class="icon-link-outline"></i>
  anywhere.
</p>

Result

Some content here

Use icon anywhere.

Code sample

<div class="icon-pin-outline inverse">
  Some content here
</div>

Result

Some content here

Color

Code sample

<div class="icon-tag inverse green">Icon</div>
<div class="icon-tag inverse orange">Icon</div>
<div class="icon-tag inverse blue">Icon</div>
<div class="icon-tag inverse purple">Icon</div>
<div class="icon-tag inverse red">Icon</div>

Result

Card

Bordered

TOTO

Sizing

XS Card

Use .xs CSS class.

Standard Card

Only use .card CSS class.

Big Card

Add .big CSS class.

Huge Card

Add .huge CSS class.

Openable

Openable API provide show/hide behavior with CSS :

  • .openable : Element with begavior.
  • .handler : Handler to open/close content.
  • .openable-content : Content show/hide.

By default, .openable-content is hide.

exemple with Card: 

<article class="card openable" style="margin-bottom: 1em">
  <header class="card-title">
    <i class="icon-openable handler"></i>
    example
  </header>
  <div class="card-content openable-content">
    <p>
      Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
      adipisicing elit. Iure eveniet, nam quam
      sit recusandae.
    </p>
  </div>
  <footer class="card-footer">.card-footer example</footer>
</article>
example

Close by default.

.card-footer example

open/close

Card with .openable class are close (.openable-content is hide).

example

Close by default.

.card-footer example
example

Add .open CSS class to card.

.card-footer example
Header as handler

Add .open CSS class to card.

.card-footer example

exemple : 

<article class="card openable" style="margin-bottom: 1em">
  <header class="card-title">
    <i class="icon-openable handler"></i>
    example
  </header>
  <div class="card-content openable-content">
    <p>
      Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
      adipisicing elit. Iure eveniet, nam quam
      sit recusandae.
    </p>
  </div>
  <footer class="card-footer">.card-footer example</footer>
</article>
